document_data.name: High Vale
document_data.mainbody: The '''High Vale''', also known as the '''Upper Vale''', was the outermost region of [[Evereska]], one that encircled the [[Vine Vale]] and the city of Evereska within.
document_data.Geography: As with the entirety of Everska, the Upper Vale was itself surrounded by the hills and mountains of the [[Shaeradim]].
document_data.Description: The steep-sloped valley was nearly a forest unto itself, mostly covered with massive, old [[spruce|spear spruce]] trees that rose up to the skies above.
document_data.History: Much of the vale's landscape was destroyed and many of its trees incinerated by [[phaerimm]] in the {{YearlinkName|1371}}, after the subterranean monstrosities were freed from the [[Sharn Wall]] deep underground.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The High Vale housed a number of ancient ''[[portal|elfgates]]'' that led to long-lost realms of the elven people. One of these magic passageways was known to be linked to the ruins of [[Sharrven]].{{Page needed}}
